definition: to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
to pierce through/to pass through/to be stringed together/string of 1000 cash
to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: It’s a compelling story with a message of restraint and mercy laced throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个自始自终贯穿了克己和仁慈的感人故事。

sentences.english: The effects of perforators nose shapes on the perforation are discussed with the calculated results.
sentences.chinese: 基于计算结果，分析了弹头部形状对贯穿过程的影响。

sentences.english: Emancipating the mind and run through the infiltration of socialism with Chinese characteristics in all levels.
sentences.chinese: 解放思想贯穿于渗透于中国特色社会主义的各个层面。

sentences.english: Our discussion of these topics occupies Chapters 2 through 12.
sentences.chinese: 这些内容贯穿了第2章至第12章。

sentences.english: And that’s the first step to the kind of body confidence that lasts.
sentences.chinese: 这就是建立信心中贯穿始末的第一步。

sentences.english: With the brief, simple language, the argument is continuous throughout the poem.
sentences.chinese: 议论依附于一种简洁平白的语言，并贯穿于整首诗作。

sentences.english: But what I didn't expect, were all of the small revelations sprinkled throughout.
sentences.chinese: 但是这个过程中贯穿的小发现却是我所没有预料到的。

sentences.english: Stories are occurring throughout the world of Tyria.
sentences.chinese: 故事贯穿分布在Tyria这整个世界。

sentences.english: The central gallery that runs through the square from north to the south has fountain waterscape.
sentences.chinese: 贯穿广场南北的中央长廊，建有喷泉水景大道。

sentences.english: There should no discharging with impenetration during test.
sentences.chinese: 试验中不应发生贯穿性放电。

sentences.english: Reading can begin with babies and continue throughout the preschool years.
sentences.chinese: 阅读可以从婴儿期开始，并继续贯穿于整个学龄期。

sentences.english: It files in the face of our history and our founding principles.
sentences.chinese: 这个办法贯穿于我们的历史和我们的建国原则。

sentences.english: Airgun pellets don't usually penetrate skin but can do so at close range.
sentences.chinese: 空气枪子弹通常不会贯穿皮肤，但若是近距离就可以。

sentences.english: Intense artillery strikes and waves of aerial bombardment were reported across the Gaza Strip.
sentences.chinese: 深入的炮击，和飞机轰炸的震颤，贯穿整个加沙地带。

sentences.english: A diamond cut white gold "X" intersects three ribbons of 14K yellow gold.
sentences.chinese: 访钻石切割的白金“X”贯穿了三带式的14K黄金。

sentences.english: Moral education throughout the school physical education in all aspects of the work.
sentences.chinese: 德育工作贯穿于学校体育工作中的各个方面。

definition: horizontal traverse/to cut across/to cross transversally
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
to span/to stretch across/to travel across
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to blend into/to integrate/to assimilate/to merge
arteries and veins/network of blood vessels/vascular system (of a plant or animal)/(fig.) fabric (i.e. underlying structure, as in "social fabric")/overall context
to cut apart/to sever/to separate/to isolate
